name: JDA Login Page
author: Austin Bange & JDA Worldwide

sections.description: Using Advanced Custom Fields Pro and Advanced Custom Fields Extended, this plugin will add an option page under the Appearance admin menu. From there, the image and image height can be customized. Image width is set to 100%.
sections.installation: Please ensure Advanced Custom Fields Pro and Advanced Custom Fields Extended are installed and activated before using this plugin.
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Tested on WordPress 6.4.3.
  • Add curved edges to the login form.

1.0.4

  • Add ability to change login page’s background color.

1.0.32

  • Correct plugin compatibility notifications.

1.0.31

  • Fix ACF Extended compatibility to identify both free and pro versions.

1.0.3

  • Update Overwrite Admin Bar Logo field description.

1.0.2

  • Add ability to overwrite Admin Bar Logo found in the top left of the admin dashboard.
  • Change plugin description.

1.0.1

  • Update meta info for clearer descriptions.
  • Add plugin compatibility warnings.

1.0.0

  • Plugin launch.

short_description: Simple plugin that enables simple white label customization, primarily to the login page.
description: Using Advanced Custom Fields Pro and Advanced Custom Fields Extended, this plugin will add an option page under the Appearance admin menu. From there, the image and image height can be customized. Image width is set to 100%.
